text: o g 怡 5 E T e 万 1 . 3 e Bl | [ 1 f 阔 国 M 一 八 一 0 一 Figure 10.48. Sampling and reconstruction with no filtering. Sampling produces alias spectra that overlap and mix with the base spectrum. Reconstruction with a box filter collects even more information from the alias spectra. The result is a signal that has serious aliasing artifacts.
